flawed_nl_solution:
He has already done 269 this week because 34 + 20 + 123 + 64 + 23 = <<34+20+123+64+23=269>>269.
If he does 55 he will have done as many as last week because 324 - 269 = <<324-269=55>>55
He has to do 56 on Saturday because 55 + 1 = <<55+1=56>>56

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 264, not 269. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
